channel.title: Mystery on Strat
channel.description: Recent content in Mystery on Strat

item.title: A Memory Called Empire
item.description: A Memory Called Empire has big “Hugo award winner” energy: an interesting premise, consistent and intriguing world building, a promising start and a propulsive ending. I loved my time with it and very excited to dig into the next book in the series although I suspect that it won’t be as good. I can confirm the second book was not as good. In fact, I think it’s a trashfire.
